articles.title: Trump promoted these drugs nearly 50 times. He abruptly stopped.
articles.description: President Donald Trump repeatedly suggested hydroxychloroquine as a treatment for Covid-19 patients. Early trials of the drug found it does not help and sometimes has negative side effects.
